aboutus.title: About us
aboutus.heading: FARELLO'S INSPIRATION
aboutus.graph1: Step out from the story of young people with the desire to find 'definition' of themselves amidst doubts about awareness, ability and life. Farello was created as a companion, a multi-dimensional and open prism for you to 'see' yourself and the world around you.
aboutus.graph2: With the message 'WHEN IN DOUBT, WEAR GLASSES', Farello wishes to be present in your life every day, giving you different perspectives, inspiring you to find the positive even in the most difficult times. the moment you are confused, confused.
aboutus.graph3: For Farello, you are the 'unique'. We want you to have a wide enough perspective, good enough to make choices that make you happy, and confident enough to pursue what you're passionate about. We know that you have personality, knowledge, and stand. You don't have to follow the crowd, you just need to catch up with your own 'ideal'.
aboutus.subtitle: Constantly CREATIVE to improve service quality, Farello has a mission to become the national title - 'Top of Mind' of all ages and styles, from elegance, luxury, knowledge to personality, popularity. chaos.
aboutus.desc1: Farello believes that the savvy consumer doesn't want designs that are only 'trendy' for a short time. We create designs that are simple, sophisticated, suitable for any occasion, easy to apply to your everyday outfits and fashionable for years. You don't have to be a fashion savvy to 'dress up' with a pair of Farello glasses. Farello is a 'national' glass that can support any style of eating, whether it's elegant, youthful or personality, liberal. You just need to choose the 'right glasses' only.
aboutus.desc2: For Farello, a successful product not only truly 'touches' the customer, but also 'touches' nature. Each Farello glasses is a combination of two factors: friendly to the skin, eyes and friendly to the environment. We use Titanium, Acetate, Stainless steel materials and Italian processing technology to ensure the glasses feel as comfortable as possible and avoid negative impacts on the green planet.
aboutus.graph4: To get products that fit and fit the Vietnamese face, flexible and convenient for all activities, each Farello glasses goes through up to 60 design and processing steps to get the specifications. most suitable technique. Combined with high-quality materials and advanced manufacturing technology perfected by skilled artisans, you will be amazed not only with its fashionable beauty but also its outstanding durability.

userOrderPage.subtext: Thank you for trusting and ordering at Farello.

policyList.desc1: We are confident to be the unit with the best after-sales service in Vietnam when applying a two-year warranty policy and returning products without reason in 30 days. The data system is constantly and accurately updated to easily look up information.
policyList.desc2: Instead of spending a lot of money to buy eyeglasses with the 'Renew Old Collection' service - 10% OFF on Farello's eyeglasses orders, customers will be supported to collect old eyeglasses and lenses at extremely low prices. Discount period, save costs as much as possible.
policyList.desc3: Farello performs free eye exams for customers when booking 24 hours in advance. With specialized doctors, high professional qualifications. Consulting eyewear suitable for each type of eye disease for customers.
policyList.desc4: Farello has recognized this problem of everyone, so today Farello will guide you how to clean and clean your glasses every day, to have a clear and fresh vision.

productDetail.buttonLabel: Privilege to buy products at Farello
productDetail.title: SET OF PRODUCTS WHEN BUYING GLASS AT FARELLO
productDetail.subtitle: When buying at Farello, you will receive accessories such as: Eyeglasses, tote bag, glasses case, warranty card, glass cleaner set, glasses case

purchasePrivileges.title: Privileges of customers buying products at Farello
purchasePrivileges.item1: 50% off replacement frames. Applicable in case your frame is damaged and does not meet the warranty conditions within 2 years from the date of purchase.
purchasePrivileges.item2: 10% discount on lenses when replacing new lenses for existing Farello frames for the sake of environmental protection.
purchasePrivileges.item3: Free 1 time glass change. If you feel uncomfortable with your vision within 2 years from the date of purchase, Farello will give you 1 free re-examination and change the lenses to suit your vision condition.
purchasePrivileges.item4: Free cleaning, changing ticks, changing screws, adjusting frames for life.
purchasePrivileges.item5: Lifetime free eye test and vision test. Applicable to all customers, including those who have not used Farello's services.
